subject: Re: [junit] Re: JUnit 4 causes an error when exception is expected
msgSnippet: ... It can t, and it shouldn t. After all, the method that is called by the test doesn t throw the exception. Cheers, Ilja
messageBody:
swe029 wrote:

> I'm wondering if this is happening because the method that generates
> the exception also catches it and hence JUnit can't find the
> exception?

It can't, and it shouldn't. After all, the method that is called by the
test doesn't throw the exception.

Cheers, Ilja
